description: A full conversation demonstrating a prompt injection attack on CanvasWizard where the attacker floods the LLM with irrelevant market facts, uses logical trickery, and obfuscates a request to embed a proprietary product description into a PDF filename, achieving data exfiltration via the temporary download URL.
